tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE evidence (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    evidence_type VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    report_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES incident_reports(id)
);

CREATE TABLE suspects (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    report_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES incident_reports(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Incident
(
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    incident_description TEXT,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Evidence
(
    evidence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    evidence_type VARCHAR(50),
    evidence_description TEXT,
    evidence_file BLOB,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES Incident(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investigation
(
    investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    investigator_id INT,
    investigation_start_date TIMESTAMP,
    investigation_end_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES Incident(incident_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (investigator_id) REFERENCES Investigator(investigator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Report
(
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    investigator_id INT,
    report_content TEXT,
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES Incident(incident_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (investigator_id) REFERENCES Investigator(investigator_id)
);
